title: 海绵服的插件问题
author: qq804779458
txt_content:
FML has found a non-mod file 某插件in your mods directory. It will now be injected into your classpath. This could severe stability issues, it should be removed if possible.


请问这是怎么回事？怎么解决？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
它是要你删除这个“某插件”

说不是一个 mod ，可能影响服务器稳定，建议删除。
